[DQR.IFRS.0080.8553] ifrs-full:PaymentsToAcquireOrRedeemEntitysShares has a value of -1,500,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:PaymentsToAcquireOrRedeemEntitysShares fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700VK1NB8HRGTQH74/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/evli-2021-12-31-fi.zip/evli-2021-12-31-fi/reports/evli-2021-12-31-fi.xhtml 12850

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9542] Oma p채채oma with a value of -502,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 112,900,000 + 5,200,000 ) with a value of 118,100,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -5 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -5 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -5
Rule Element Id:9542 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700VK1NB8HRGTQH74/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/evli-2021-12-31-fi.zip/evli-2021-12-31-fi/reports/evli-2021-12-31-fi.xhtml 12850

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 04 - Tase but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 05 - Rahavirtalaskelma but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Voittoa tai tappiota osoittava laskelma but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, evli:DilutedEarningsPerShareIFRSFullyDiluted, ifrs-full:GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationBeforeTax, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 04 - Statement of financial position but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 05 - Statement of cash flows but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Profit or loss but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:GainsLossesOnExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationBeforeTax, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, evli:DilutedEarningsPerShareIFRSFullyDiluted All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 21,900,000 reported in the network role http://www.evli.com/roles/ProfitOrLoss should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 21,300,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.evli.com/roles/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -5 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -5 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700VK1NB8HRGTQH74/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/1/evli-2021-12-31-en.zip/evli-2021-12-31-en/reports/evli-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 12673
